articles.description: Launched a year ago, the Nilekani Center at AI4Bhārat has set up a team of close to 200 translators across the country covering 22 Indian languages. Tech billionaire philanthropist Nandan Nilekani is the primary sponsor of the Nilekani Center at AI4Bharat wit…
